prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with a pouch and strong arms for battling.
I want a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a kangaroo and has a caring nature.
Generate a Pokemon with a powerful build and a baby in its pouch.
Make a sturdy Pokemon that thrives in grassy fields and forests.
Imagine a Pokemon with a protective personality and a love for its family.
Design a Pokemon that can leap high and has a brownish color scheme.
Show me a Pokemon that is both a fighter and a nurturer in battle.
